org.holoeverywhere.addon

Class IAddonThemes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.holoeverywhere.addon.IAddonThemes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThemeManager.ThemeSetter

    public class IAddonThemes
extends java.lang.Object
implements ThemeManager.ThemeSetter
    Helper for handling custom themes for required parts of library, like view themes in preferences addon
